name: damp
effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Prevents the use of
self-destructing moves.

flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.
